name: Gel Together
description:
Gel Together is a difficult puzzle game where your goal is simply to move cute jelly characters left and right to get all of the jellies of the same colour to merge. In other words, the goal is to get the gel... together. The mechanics are simple and easy to understand, but the puzzles are deceptively difficult!

This is an unofficial fan-remake of Qrostar's amazing "Jelly no Puzzle" game, with all new levels and a level editor. Made with permission from Tatsunami. Development, art, and puzzle design by Danatron1 (me!)

Play the original game (also free) here: https://qrostar.skr.jp/en/jelly/

If you have any feedback regarding bugs, graphics, difficulty, etc. please comment them! You can also discuss the game on my subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GelTogether/
